findings.lower_chest: No confluent airspace consolidation. No pleural effusions. Minor atelectasis in the right lung base.

abdomen.hepatobiliary: The liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation throughout. No focal lesions or biliary dilatation. Gallbladder is normal.
abdomen.pancreas: Normal attenuation, no focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
abdomen.spleen: Normal size and attenuation, no focal lesions.
abdomen.urinary: Normal symmetric kidneys, small simple right renal cyst.
abdomen.gastrointestinal: Markedly dilated small bowel loops with air-fluid levels and two new transition points. Marked thickening of the distal ileal wall.
abdomen.pelvis: At least 2 rim enhancing collections in the pelvis, larger in left hemipelvis measuring 87 x 41 mm, smaller in right hemipelvis measuring 27 x 21 mm.
abdomen.lymph_nodes: Reactive mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes.
abdomen.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm, mild atherosclerotic disease.
abdomen.bones: No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
abdomen.soft_tissues: Abdominal and pelvic wall is within normal limits.
